I'm not sure if my experience is related at all (these zigs and zags are really tight and bizarre) but I've definitely had orbit lines not tessellate properly in some circumstances. For example, in highly elliptical orbits, when my craft is near apoapsis but my camera is near periapsis, that sort of thing, the orbit lines get pretty jaggy.
